name: Manual Nitrogen Purging Unit Type MSS
description:
Manual purging:
the operator inserts the purging rod into the cylinder all the way to the bottom.
Afterwards by means of a filling head he fills a predetermined quantity of nitrogen
(head connected to a nitrogen cylinder) into the cylinder, and the evaporated gas
presses all atmospheric air out of the cylinder.
Bottles to be handled: universal
The Unit consists of:
- Steel rod with fill fitting
- 3m hose, both sides W21,8x1/14'', left (to the nitrogen cylinder)
Nitrogen cylinder not inclusive!
*************************************
- Pressure reducer (optional), not included
- Wall mounting kit (optional), not included
